    • Method Detail

      • medianFilter

        public static void medianFilter(MyImage img,
                int maskSize)
        This method is used to perform median filtering on the image object passed.
        Parameters:
        img - The image object passed on which median filtering is performed.
        maskSize - - The size of the mask is an odd integer like 3, 5, 7 … etc.

      • medianFilter_RGB

        public static void medianFilter_RGB(MyImage img,
                    int maskSize)
        This method is used to perform median filtering on the image object passed.
        Parameters:
        img - The image object passed on which median filtering is performed.
        maskSize - - The size of the mask is an odd integer like 3, 5, 7 … etc.

      • medianFilter_ZeroFill

        public static void medianFilter_ZeroFill(MyImage img,
                         int maskSize)
        This method is used to perform median filtering on the image object passed. This method will fill the cells of the mask not over the pixels of the image with 0. Mask 3x3 | V Image Pixels 3x5 +-+-+-+ | |0|0|0| V +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |0|1|2|3|2|1| +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |0|4|5|6|5|4| +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |7|8|9|8|7| +-+-+-+-+-+
        Parameters:
        img - The image object passed on which median filtering is performed.
        maskSize - - The size of the mask is an odd integer like 3, 5, 7 … etc.

      • medianFilter_ValueFill

        public static void medianFilter_ValueFill(MyImage img,
                          int maskSize)
        This method is used to perform median filtering on the image object passed. This method will fill the cells of the mask not over the pixels of the image with the value of the pixels near to the cell. Mask 3x3 | V Image Pixels 3x5 +-+-+-+ | |1|1|2| V +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |1|1|2|3|2|1| +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |4|4|5|6|5|4| +-+-+-+-+-+-+ |7|8|9|8|7| +-+-+-+-+-+
        Parameters:
        img - The image object passed on which median filtering is performed.
        maskSize - - The size of the mask is an odd integer like 3, 5, 7 … etc.
